traits.Pack Tactics: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
